Merge pull request #6 from TheNephilim88/master

Update gradle plugin
Rename activity for creating and editing notifications

Update tabs library and make necessary changes

The updated library required a different ViewPage adapter
implementation.
This update also added ripples to the tabs.
Use enum to get list type
Use callback to hide floating action button

Added ability to choose icon and colour for each notification
Added new strings for recurrence on specific days
Added colour and icon picker dialogs
Edited layouts to support icon and colour changes
Added support for notification icon and colour changes
Reset default text if default icon is selected
Added dynamic icon dialog grid columns
Changed active and inactive notifications queries
Added new strings, updated translations and added plurals
Added default snooze time integer resource

Merge pull request #34 from greizgh/french-translation

Add french translation

Merge pull request #35 from jonasbleyl/dev

Merge dev into master
Add start animation to recycler view
Prevent recyclerview animation crash when there are no items
From unnecessary context variable from adapter

Prevent item clicks if start animation hasn't completed

Also ensure that partially visible items are animated

Fix FAB margin

The margins are now displayed correctly on Pre-Lollipop devices.

Allow typing into number pickers

Focus is set on the root layout to prevent the number pickers from
being focused on. This prevents the number picker from being
highlighted when initially shown.
